title: Funny Quote
body: It’s not a bug. It’s an undocumented feature!
author: John Wayne

title: Funny Quote
body: Software Developer” – An organism that turns caffeine into software
author: John Wayne

title: Funny Quote
body: If debugging is the process of removing software bugs, then programming must be the process of putting them in
author: John Wayne

title: Funny Quote
body: A user interface is like a joke. If you have to explain it, it’s not that good.
author: John Wayne

title: Funny Quote
body: I don’t care if it works on your machine! We are not shipping your machine!
author: John Wayne

title: Funny Quote
body: Measuring programming progress by lines of code is like measuring aircraft building progress by weight.
author: John Wayne
